alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 4:27AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of Gulf, southeastern Bay, southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and southwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 500 AM EDT/400 AM CDT/... At 426 AM EDT/326 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Hiland Park to 11 miles southwest of Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Callaway, Port St. Joe, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Allanton, Chipola Cutoff, Beacon Beach, Red Hill, Overstreet, Milltown, Davis Beach, Kinard, Chipola Park and Wetappo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Liberty
